text: Elaeocarpus montanus is a species of flowering plant in the Elaeocarpaceae family used as a medicinal plant. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. It is known as "Gal weralu - ගල් වෙරලු" by Sinhalese people. ==References== ==External links== *jstor.org montanus Category:Endemic flora of Sri Lanka
title: Elaeocarpus montanus
